pages.title: Blue Morpho
pages.text: Morpho didius, the giant blue morpho, is a Neotropical butterfly belonging to the subfamily Morphinae of family Nymphalidae.$(br2)It is considered, by some authors, to be a subspecies of Morpho menelaus.

pages.title: Blue Morpho
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:dandelion$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: None Days
